alert.note: Alert for North St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:01PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central St. Louis County through 430 PM CDT... At 401 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crane Lake, or 31 miles north of Lake Vermilion, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... northwestern Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
